translation.en: From this point forward,

translation.en: I do not want you to address me as "the Prince"
translation.zh: 从现在开始 你不要称呼我 皇太子或殿下

translation.en: or "Your Royal Highness."
translation.zh: 皇太子或殿下

translation.en: You will address me as...
translation.zh: 你叫我 埃迪

translation.en: Eddie. Yes, "Eddie."

translation.en: The last thing I need right now is to have the press all over me.

translation.en: I think it's gonna be fun.
translation.zh: 我觉得我们会过得很有意思的

translation.en: I'm having a wonderful time already.
translation.zh: 我早就觉得很有意思了

translation.en: Are you unhappy, Soren?
translation.zh: 你是不是不高兴 索尔

translation.en: What gave me away, sir?

translation.en: I don't know. Your expression never changes.

translation.en: Do you even know how to smile? [smacks lips] Yes.
translation.zh: -你会笑吗？-我会

translation.en: Oh, Soren, this is us.
translation.zh: 索尔 这是我们的房间

translation.en: Good heavens.
translation.zh: 好极了

translation.en: I thought you had to be convicted of a crime

translation.en: before you lived somewhere like this.

translation.en: Ah, it's not that bad.
translation.zh: 没那么糟糕

translation.en: Plus, we haven't seen the rest of it yet.

translation.en: Apparently, this is the rest of it.
translation.zh: 很明显 就这么大

translation.en: Well, I like it.
translation.zh: 反正我喜欢这地方

translation.en: And I'll even let you have first choice of the beds.
translation.zh: 我甚至可以让你先挑张床

translation.en: Oh, heavens. Uh...
translation.zh: 真是天堂

translation.en: Which stained mattress shall I choose?
translation.zh: 我该要哪张床垫 都脏

translation.en: You the new guys?
translation.zh: 你们是新来的

translation.en: I'm Scotty.
translation.zh: 我叫斯考特

translation.en: All right, all my food's labeled,
translation.zh: 听着 我所有的吃的都会做标记

translation.en: so I'll know if you ate anything.
translation.zh: 你们要吃了我的东西 我会知道的

translation.en: I'm allergic to dairy, shellfish, red meat,
translation.zh: 我对牛奶 贝壳 肉

translation.en: melon, nuts and kiwi.
translation.zh: 瓜 坚果 还有弥猴桃会过敏

translation.en: So don't bring any of that stuff around here.
translation.zh: 所以 不要把这些东西带进来

translation.en: The Xbox is off-limits.
translation.zh: 不许打我拉Xbox

translation.en: If you screw up any of my high scores,
translation.zh: 要是你们破了我的游戏记录

translation.en: I'll blind you with my laser pointer.
translation.zh: 我就用我的激光笔照瞎你们的眼睛

translation.en: Ah, now, this... This is the real university life I was talking about.
translation.zh: 看 这才是我说的 真正的大学生活

translation.en: You see, here, we're just two typical college students.
translation.zh: 看 在这儿 我们就是两个普通的大学生

translation.en: Absolutely, sir. I, for one, can't wait to raucously cheer on the fellows
translation.zh: 当然 殿下 我是其中之一

translation.en: of the tackle-football team as they challenge the Gophers,
translation.zh: 已经急不可待地想沙哑着嗓子 为我们球队呐喊

translation.en: our hated rivals, who apparently hail
translation.zh: 为我们最讨厌的橄榄球对手

translation.en: from a place called Minnesota.
translation.zh: 明尼苏达队加油助威了

translation.en: Minnesota sucks! Wisconsin rules!
translation.zh: 明尼苏达去吃屎 威斯康新必胜

translation.en: No, no.
translation.zh: 不 不

translation.en: Ah, waitress, we'd like to see some menus, please.
translation.zh: 招待 我们想看一下菜单 麻烦一下

translation.en: I'm not a waitress, there are no menus,
translation.zh: 我不是招待 这儿也没有菜单 厨房已经关了

translation.en: and the kitchen is closed.
translation.zh: 这儿也没有菜单 厨房已经关了

translation.en: Well, then what can you offer us?
translation.zh: 那么有什么可以填肚子的

translation.en: I can offer you beer and pretzel rods, my fine fellow, at ye old pub yonder.
translation.zh: 我们这儿有啤酒 小饼干

translation.en: Shall I go to the bar, sir?
translation.zh: 要我去拿酒吗 殿下？

translation.en: Yes, um... Yes, two of these. Two beers.
translation.zh: 行 行 两瓶这个 啤酒

translation.en: Very good.
translation.zh: 很好

translation.en: Would you like another, sir?
translation.zh: 还要一杯吗 殿下？

translation.en: Yes, I'll get these. Thank you very much, sir.
translation.zh: -行 我去买吧-多谢了 先生

translation.en: Hello again. What can I get for you?
translation.zh: -你好-要点什么？

translation.en: Well, I was hoping you could recommend
translation.zh: 你能不能推荐一点更好的饮料

translation.en: something better than what we've been drinking.
translation.zh: 你能不能推荐一点更好的饮料 比我们现在喝的好一点的

translation.en: Well, for the discerning out-of-towner like yourself,
translation.zh: 很明显 对你这样的非本城的人

translation.en: I recommend Leinenkugel's.
translation.zh: 我推荐雷纳库乐牌啤酒

translation.en: You can really taste the extra ten cents.
translation.zh: 贵10分 但你会尝出区别的

translation.en: Yes, by all means. Two, please.
translation.zh: 行 不管怎样 给我来两杯

translation.en: You know, if we were in Germany right now,
translation.zh: 知道吗？要是我们在德国的话

translation.en: -we'd be underground. -What?
translation.zh: 我们现在应该是在地下 什么

translation.en: "Rathskeller." It means "basement."
translation.zh: Rathskeller是地下室的意思

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: Yes, perhaps I should've known better than to flirt in German.
translation.zh: 是的 或许我应该说些别的 而不是用德语调情

translation.en: Perhaps.
translation.zh: 或许

translation.en: It's a very, uh, attractive language, isn't it?
translation.zh: 德语听上去并不很有吸引力 对吗？

translation.en: [smirks] No.
translation.zh: 当然没吸引力

translation.en: I'm Eddie. Paige.
translation.zh: -我叫埃迪-佩吉

translation.en: So, will you take your top off for me?
translation.zh: -那你愿意为我把上衣脱了吗？-什么？

translation.en: What? Take your top off for me like Wild College Girls.
translation.zh: 就象那些放纵的大学女生一样把上衣脱了

translation.en: Just a quick look. No, no. No one's watching.
translation.zh: 就很快一下 没人会看到的

translation.en: Just... Just take it off for me.
translation.zh: 脱一下上衣 给我看看

translation.en: -You, time to go. -Just calm down, gentlemen.
translation.zh: -你该走了-冷静 -不 你冷静一点-放开我

translation.en: -No, you calm down. -Get off me.
translation.zh: -不 你冷静一点-放开我

translation.en: -[all grunting] -Get out.
translation.zh: -你出去 -放开我

translation.en: -[Eddie] Get your hands off me. -Out. Go on!
translation.zh: 出去 走

translation.en: Science is a never-ending quest.
translation.zh: 科学是永无止境的探索

translation.en: For anyone planning a future in science,
translation.zh: 任何一个想要在科学上有所建树的人

translation.en: an open mind is a must.
translation.zh: 必须要有一个开放的思想

translation.en: Grading is as follows.
translation.zh: 这门课会按以下规则打分:

translation.en: Forty percent, procedure.
translation.zh: 40%的课堂表现

translation.en: Fifty percent, lab work. -And ten... -[door opens]
translation.zh: 50%的实验结果 还有10%

translation.en: May I help you?
translation.zh: 有什么可以帮忙的吗？

translation.en: Yes. I believe I'm signed up for this class.
translation.zh: 我应该是注册了这门课

translation.en: Fine, Mr. Williams.
translation.zh: 好的 威廉先生

translation.en: Next time be here by 8:20 a.m., or you'll be locked out.
translation.zh: 下一次 记得在8:20之前到 不然你会被关在外面

translation.en: And what about you? I'm talking to you, sir.
translation.zh: 你呢？我和你说话呢 先生

translation.en: I'm... Uh, auditing.
translation.zh: 我是旁听的

translation.en: Not this class, too small. Take a seat, Mr. Williams.
translation.zh: 这节课不能旁听 课堂太挤了 找个位子坐吧 威廉先生

translation.en: As I was saying, 40% procedure.
translation.zh: 我说了 40%的课堂表现

translation.en: -Fifty percent, lab work. -You can wait outside.
translation.zh: -50%的实验结果-你可以在外面等

translation.en: -You'll be all right? -And 10%...
translation.zh: -你能行吗 殿下？-还有10%

translation.en: -Yes, just wait outside. -You know,
translation.zh: 对 在外面等就行 如果你们是在谈情说爱

translation.en: if this is a "lovers' thing,"
translation.zh: 如果你们是在谈情说爱

translation.en: could you please take it in the hall?
translation.zh: 能不能到外面走廊里去说

translation.en: -[students chuckle] -Soren, just go. Go. Go.
translation.zh: 索尔 出去吧 走

translation.en: [breathes deeply] My sincerest apologies.
translation.zh: 对不起

translation.en: Oh, please proceed.
translation.zh: 请继续

translation.en: And 10% attendance.
translation.zh: 还有10% 是出勤

translation.en: You will find a list in front of you
translation.zh: 在你面前 有一张单子 列出了你的实验

translation.en: of your supplies and the experiment
translation.zh: 在你面前 有一张单子 列出了你的实验 器材和所要做的实验

translation.en: you will be conducting.
translation.zh: 器材和所要做的实验

translation.en: Now, I want you to turn to the person next to you
translation.zh: 现在 我要求你们和同桌的人

translation.en: and introduce yourself.
translation.zh: 互相自我介绍一下

translation.en: Congratulations, folks,
translation.zh: 恭喜你们

translation.en: you've just said hello to your permanent lab partner.
translation.zh: 你们刚和你们这堂课固定的实验搭挡打过招呼

translation.en: You forgot your supply list.
translation.zh: 你忘了拿你的单子的

translation.en: Oh, right, thank you.
translation.zh: 对 谢谢

translation.en: Listen, what's your name again?
translation.zh: -听着 你叫什么来着？-埃迪

translation.en: -Eddie. -Eddie. Right.
translation.zh: -听着 你叫什么来着？-埃迪 埃迪 对 这堂课对我真的很重要

translation.en: This class is really important to me
translation.zh: 埃迪 对 这堂课对我真的很重要 因为我需要这老师推荐我进医学院

translation.en: because I need this teacher to get me into med school.
translation.zh: 因为我需要这老师推荐我进医学院

translation.en: And if I'm stuck with you as my lab partner,
translation.zh: 要是我因为你是我的搭挡

translation.en: I really can't afford to have you screw things up for me, okay?
translation.zh: 而搞砸的话 我会抓狂的 明白吗？

translation.en: It's very important to me, as well. I... I love organic chemistry.
translation.zh: 这对我也很要紧 我喜欢有机化学

translation.en: For instance, I've just recently discovered
translation.zh: 最近我发现大量的酒精

translation.en: that large amounts of alcohol mixed with a carbon-based life-form
translation.zh: 和以碳为主要构成的生命形式混合

translation.en: causes the life-form to blurt out stupid things.
translation.zh: 会导致这个生命形式做出蠢事

translation.en: So... Well, apologies for the other night.
translation.zh: 所以 我对那晚的事很抱歉

translation.en: I was just having some fun.
translation.zh: 我只是开个玩笑

translation.en: Right. Of course, you were.
translation.zh: 当然你在开玩笑

translation.en: And I love being made to feel like a brainless slut
translation.zh: 我也很高兴会被某些龌龊的公子哥

translation.en: by some sloppy lush. Thanks.
translation.zh: 当成是个放荡女人 多谢了

translation.en: "I have learned me to repent the sin of disobedient opposition...
translation.zh: 我刚学会怎么向人道歉和弥补过失

translation.en: To you and your behest, I am enjoined... To beg your pardon."
translation.zh: 对于你和你的要求我会听从 请原谅我

translation.en: Is he drunk now?
translation.zh: 他是不是又喝醉了

translation.en: It's a play. Uh, Romeo and Juliet?

translation.en: Shakespeare?
translation.zh: 莎士比亚

translation.en: This is gonna be a fun semester.
translation.zh: 这将会是很有意思的一学期

translation.en: Don't forget your half of the supplies next time.
translation.zh: 下次 别忘了带你的那一半器材

translation.en: I mean, you would think that after spraying somebody
translation.zh: 你知道 用高压苏打水冲某人

translation.en: with high-powered soda, he'd get the message to stay away.
translation.zh: 表示你想让他离你远点

translation.en: Well, I think he's pretty hot.
translation.zh: 可是 我觉得他很性感

translation.en: Hot? Oh, my God, Beth, he is so affected.
translation.zh: 性感 天啊 贝斯 他好做作的

translation.en: He was quoting Shakespeare,
translation.zh: 居然引用莎士比亚

translation.en: like, some... Shakespearean-duke-lord guy.

translation.en: I hate phonies like that.
translation.zh: 我最讨厌那些附庸风雅的人

translation.en: So are you saying you wouldn't take him up to the stacks?
translation.zh: 就是说 你不会和他一起去图书馆

translation.en: [scoffs] Okay. A, going at it in the dusty stacks
translation.zh: 好吧 第一 去脏脏的文学图书馆是件很恶心的事

translation.en: of the library is fairly disgusting.
translation.zh: 去脏脏的文学图书馆是件很恶心的事

translation.en: And, B, you literally say that about every hot guy.
translation.zh: 第二 对每个性感的人你都这么问

translation.en: -[mutes television] -Oh, so you admit he's hot.
translation.zh: 第二 对每个性感的人你都这么问 你承认他很性感了

translation.en: Okay, I'm done having this conversation.
translation.zh: 行了 我不想再说下去了

translation.en: I need to concentrate on my applications.
translation.zh: 我得专业写我拉作业

translation.en: And what's with his weird friend who's always hanging around?
translation.zh: 他那个老围着他转的奇怪朋友是怎么回事？

translation.en: [Professor] One partner is monitoring temperature and flow,
translation.zh: 同组两人 一个负责观察温度和流量

translation.en: while the other pours the hydrochloric acid into the separatory funnel.
translation.zh: 另一个把高氯酸倒入分流管里

translation.en: Now...
translation.zh: 现在

translation.en: Carefully turn the stopcock
translation.zh: 小心地打开活塞

translation.en: to allow some of the solution to flow into the round-bottom flask.
translation.zh: 让溶液缓缓流入圆底烧瓶

translation.en: Start over again.
translation.zh: 重来吧

translation.en: Where is he?
translation.zh: 他在哪儿

translation.en: You're still in bed?
translation.zh: -你还在睡觉-早上好 小姐

translation.en: Uh, good morning, miss. Would you care for some breakfast?
translation.zh: 你想要吃点早餐吗？

translation.en: I just spent the last two hours looking like an incompetent idiot
translation.zh: 过去两个小时 我就像个白痴一样

translation.en: because my lab partner didn't show up.
translation.zh: 因为我的实验搭档没来

translation.en: -Oh. Was that this morning? -Yes!
translation.zh: -是今天早上-对

translation.en: -You know, I know exactly who you are. -You do?
translation.zh: 我现在知道你是什么样的人了 -真的-真的

translation.en: -You do? -You're just a spoiled
translation.zh: -真的-真的 你是个被宠坏的 富家公子 视大学为

translation.en: little rich kid who sees college as a detour
translation.zh: 你是个被宠坏的 富家公子 视大学为

translation.en: on the way to an easy life.
translation.zh: 通向舒适生活的一段弯路

translation.en: No character, no accomplishments,
translation.zh: 品行不端 不学无术

translation.en: just a royal pain in the ass. You're completely wrong.
translation.zh: -就是个捣蛋鬼-你完全错了

translation.en: See, unlike people who are given everything,
translation.zh: 听着 和那些不劳而获的人不同

translation.en: I have to earn what I get.
translation.zh: 我必须得努力去得到回报

translation.en: But that is the beauty of a meritocracy.
translation.zh: 不过那正是学习美妙的地方

translation.en: People rise and fall based on how hard they work.
translation.zh: 你付出多少 就收获多少

translation.en: Would you like some more hollandaise, Eddie?
translation.zh: 你要多加点酸辣酱吗？

translation.en: -No, that's good. Thank you. -You're making Eggs Benedict?
translation.zh: 不用了 正好 谢谢 你在做炒蛋给他吃

translation.en: -Mmm-hmm. -On a hot plate in a dorm room?
translation.zh: 在宿舍里做炒蛋

translation.en: Yes, just a typical student breakfast.
translation.zh: 是的 不过是普通的学生早餐

translation.en: Would you care to join us?
translation.zh: 你想一起吃点吗？

translation.en: No, thank you.
translation.zh: 不用了 谢谢

translation.en: So, um, where's your statue?
translation.zh: -你的偶象是谁？-什么偶象？

translation.en: What statue?
translation.zh: -你的偶象是谁？-什么偶象？ 向你这样自认为正义的人

translation.en: Well, someone as righteous as you, must have some sort of
translation.zh: 向你这样自认为正义的人 一定会有一个秘密的心中的偶象

translation.en: statue of themselves somewhere.
translation.zh: 一定会有一个秘密的心中的偶象

translation.en: There's a difference between being righteous and being right.
translation.zh: 自认为正义和理直气壮是两回事

translation.en: I happen to be right. Could you please put a shirt on or something?
translation.zh: 我只不过正巧是理直气壮 你能穿上件上衣吗？

translation.en: If you're going to be a doctor, you're gonna have to get used to naked men.
translation.zh: 你要是以后想做医生的话 最好对人体还是先习惯起来

translation.en: Dude! Dude, there's a chick in our room.
translation.zh: 喂 喂 我们房里有个小妞

translation.en: -Just drop the class. -No.
translation.zh: -你退了这堂课吧-不行

translation.en: Well, then you better be there, and you better be prepared.
translation.zh: 那你最好还是出席 另外用功准备一下

translation.en: She really meant those things, didn't she?
translation.zh: 她是当真的 是吗？

translation.en: [Soren] Yes, she did seem rather upset, sir.
translation.zh: 是的 她看上去确实很沮丧 殿下

translation.en: Though, regardless, I, uh, don't see why you would care.
translation.zh: 不过 不管怎么样 你没有理由 为此担心

translation.en: Do enjoy the eggs, sir.
translation.zh: 蛋还不错吧 殿下？

translation.en: They were purchased with the last of your money.
translation.zh: 他们是用你最后的一点钱买的

translation.en: -We have some left, don't we? -What you came with is gone.
translation.zh: 我们还有钱 是吗？ 你带来的钱已经用完了

translation.en: Well, you... You're getting some sort of paycheck, aren't you?
translation.zh: 好 你有收入的 是吗？

translation.en: Hey, you cheap Swede.
translation.zh: 嘿 你个不要脸的瑞典人

translation.en: "Skills, polo, fencing,
translation.zh: "技能: 马球 击剑 法语

translation.en: speak French, English, German, Dutch,
translation.zh: "技能: 马球 击剑 法语 英语 德语 丹麦语

translation.en: Danish and Flemish."
translation.zh: "佛兰德语"

translation.en: "Flemish"? Is there a country called Flem?
translation.zh: 佛兰德语 有佛兰德这个国家吗？

translation.en: Look, that's all great, but it doesn't mean crap to me.
translation.zh: 听着 这些都很棒 不过对这工作没用

translation.en: I need somebody with some work experience,
translation.zh: 我需要一个有工作经验的 这你一点也没有

translation.en: -and you don't have any. -No, listen, I really could do
translation.zh: 我需要一个有工作经验的 这你一点也没有 我可以做好这份工的

translation.en: with the employment, please. There are a lot of students who wanna work here.
translation.zh: 有很多学生想要这份工作

translation.en: Well, I have the highest recommendation.
translation.zh: 好吧 我有人强力推荐

translation.en: -Hey, Paige. -Hi.
translation.zh: -嗨 佩吉-嗨

translation.en: Are you deliberately trying to make my life miserable?
translation.zh: 你是不是在努力使我生活得悲惨

translation.en: No, I'm simply manning the delicatessen
translation.zh: 不 我只不过现在主理一下熟食部分

translation.en: in the event that one of my fellow students wants a tasty sandwich.
translation.zh: 我们有学生想要吃一份很好的三明治

translation.en: Stu, did you hire this guy?
translation.zh: 斯图 你雇了这个人

translation.en: Yeah. He came highly recommended.
translation.zh: 是的 他有强力推荐

translation.en: -By whom? -You.
translation.zh: -谁推荐的？-你

translation.en: -Yes, what would you like? -I'll have a turkey sandwich.
translation.zh: -想要些什么？-火鸡三明治

translation.en: that's not for you to decide.
translation.zh: 殿下 我不是冒犯你这事你不能做主的

translation.en: Soren, yes, it is for me to decide.

translation.en: What am I gonna do here for five days?

translation.en: I don't know. Just sightsee, relax.

translation.en: Soren, you'll be fine, okay.

translation.en: -[driver] I'll pick you up Monday. -[Paige] Thanks again.

translation.en: -[Eddie] Thank you. -Hey!

translation.en: [Amy] Hiya, sweetie. Oh, it's good to have you home.

translation.en: -[Paige] Oh. Hi, Dad. -Hi, kiddo.
translation.zh: -嗨 爸爸-嗨 小家伙

translation.en: Uh, this is Eddie. Eddie, this is my mom and dad.
translation.zh: 这是埃迪 埃迪 这是我爸爸妈妈

translation.en: Oh, we're so glad that you could join us.
translation.zh: 很高兴来我们家

translation.en: The only college friends of Paige's that we've ever met, they've all been girls.
translation.zh: 这是我们遇到的唯一的佩吉的大学同学 其他的都是女孩子

translation.en: [Eddie] Well, thank you, I was glad to be invited.
translation.zh: 谢谢 很高兴你们邀请我来

translation.en: -Eddie, I'm Ben Morgan. -Ben, hello.
translation.zh: 你好 我是本·摩根 本 你好

translation.en: -[John] Hey, hey, Doc Paige. -[Paige chuckles]
translation.zh: 喂 佩吉大夫

translation.en: -[Paige] Farmer John Sausage! -[John] Oh!
translation.zh: 臭农民 乔治 大香肠

translation.en: Uh, Mike, you look great.
translation.zh: 迈克 你看上去棒极了

translation.en: Uh, well, you know, Kayla's got me on Slim-Fast.
translation.zh: 知道吗？ 凯拉让我吃减肥药 我瘦了15磅

translation.en: -So, I lost 15. -[John] Yeah, you put five of it back on today,
translation.zh: 凯拉让我吃减肥药 我瘦了15磅 他今天在饭店又吃回了5磅

translation.en: -at Rocky Rococo's. -[Amy] Boys.

translation.en: Uh, who's this guy?

translation.en: This is Eddie. Eddie's an exchange student from Denmark.

translation.en: -He's just a friend. -Hello.
translation.zh: -他只是个朋友而已-你好

translation.en: Welcome to our home. Thank you. [chuckles]
translation.zh: -欢迎来我们家-谢谢

translation.en: Mike, he speaks better English than you do. [chuckles]

translation.en: Anyway, uh, Pops, we'll see you in the morning.
translation.zh: 是啊 反正 伙计们 明天早上见

translation.en: Hey, we're watching you, Frenchy.

translation.en: [Amy] Come on in to the house.
translation.zh: 来 进屋里去吧

translation.en: -You can ignore the moron twins. -Okay.
translation.zh: -不必理会那两个家伙-好

translation.en: This is it.
translation.zh: 就是这儿

translation.en: -Oh, you can put 'em right here. -Right.
translation.zh: -你放在这儿吧-好

translation.en: -Thanks. -[sighs]
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: What are all the pins for?
translation.zh: 这些图钉是干什么的？

translation.en: The few red ones are where I've been,
translation.zh: 那些红钉子的地方是我去过的

translation.en: and all the green ones are where I want to go.
translation.zh: 而绿钉子钉的地方是我想去的

translation.en: [Eddie] Ecuador and El Salvador.
translation.zh: 厄瓜多尔圣萨尔瓦多

translation.en: [soft chuckle] They're not exactly tourist destinations, are they?
translation.zh: 好象不是旅游胜地吧

translation.en: No. But they're all the places that Doctors Without Borders brings good medical care
translation.zh: 不 有过 那些地方是全世界 各地的医生发明新药

translation.en: and vaccinations and clean drinking water... What?
translation.zh: 各地的医生发明新药 和纯静水的地主 怎么？

translation.en: Nothing.
translation.zh: 没什么

translation.en: I've just really never met someone who makes me feel so intimidated.
translation.zh: 我只是从没碰到过 有人让我觉得生活如此有方向

translation.en: And believe me, I've met my fair share of intimidating people.
translation.zh: 相信我 我碰到过不少生活目标明确的人

translation.en: [scoffs] I'm not intimidating, look at me.
translation.zh: 我不是那样 看着我

translation.en: Yes, well, you see, that's pretty intimidating as well.
translation.zh: 是的 听着 但还是很远的目标

translation.en: Well, I'm not the only one with goals, what do you want to do?
translation.zh: 我不是唯一有生活目标的人你想干什么？

translation.en: Well, I don't really have any choice. I have to take over the family business.

translation.en: -No choice at all? -No.
translation.zh: -没有选择-没有

translation.en: -[squeaks] -Careful, you're crushing Gus.

translation.en: Oh, Gus.

translation.en: Yes, Gus, he's a very good watch moose.

translation.en: Not once was I attacked by a monster under my bed,
translation.zh: 有他在 我从没被床下幽灵

translation.en: or something scary in the closet.
translation.zh: 或是藏在柜子里的别的东西欺负过

translation.en: Isn't that right, Gus?
translation.zh: 对吗 盖斯？

translation.en: -[chuckles] -Yes, that's right.
translation.zh: 是的 对

translation.en: Hello, Gus, nice to meet you.
translation.zh: 嗨 盖斯 很高兴认识你

translation.en: -[deep voice] Very pleased to meet you as well. -[Eddie chuckles]
translation.zh: 我也很高兴见到你

translation.en: I like you like this. Like what?
translation.zh: -你喜欢你象现在的样-什么样子？

translation.en: You know, just... Just like this. Just Paige.
translation.zh: 讲不清楚 就这样 就是佩吉

translation.en: All right, Eddie, we got John's room made up for you.
translation.zh: 行了 埃迪 我们把乔治的房间收拾给你

translation.en: It's just down the hall, across from our room.
translation.zh: 就在走廊那头 我们的房间对面

translation.en: We sleep with the door open. Thanks, Dad.

translation.en: Maybe, help us out tomorrow?

translation.en: No, no, I don't think that's such a good idea.

translation.en: [Ben] Oh, why not?

translation.en: [Eddie] Yes, why not?

translation.en: Okay, you know what, go ahead and help out.

translation.en: I'm gonna enjoy this.
translation.zh: 我有好戏看了

translation.en: [Ben] Come on, let's get you settled in.
translation.zh: 来 我们先帮你安顿好

translation.en: -[cow mooing] -[Eddie] Stop, stop. [Eddie] Stop.

translation.zh: 没见过那么多拖拉机吧

translation.en: [Mike] Nicely done with the milking.
translation.zh: 挤奶干得不错

translation.en: [John] Yeah, I think you got a new best friend in Bessy. [Mike] Phew!
translation.zh: 是啊 贝丝把你当好朋友了

translation.zh: -喂 去吃点东西怎么样？-那些是什么？

translation.en: [Mike] They're lawn mowers. Lawn mowers? Really?
translation.zh: -那是割草车-割草车 真的

translation.en: [Mike] Yeah.
translation.zh: 是啊

translation.en: Actually, we race these.
translation.zh: 实际上 我们用它来赛车

translation.en: -It's a huge sport around here. -Really?
translation.zh: 这是这儿的一项大赛 真的吗？

translation.en: -Yeah. -Do you mind if I have a look?
translation.zh: -对-介意我瞧一眼吗？

translation.en: [John] No, be our guest.

translation.en: Take a look at this one. This is my baby.

translation.en: Right.

translation.en: I just put a new flywheel in there.

translation.en: Yes, I see.

translation.en: You know, no matter how dirty he races,

translation.en: there's no way we're letting Keith Kopetsky take home the trophy again this year.

translation.en: We clocked it at 52.

translation.en: I can make it faster.

translation.en: -[John chuckles] -[scoffs] Okay, come on, let's go.

translation.en: -[Eddie] What? Oh, you don't believe me? -[John] That's good.

translation.en: -[John and Mike snigger] -[Eddie] I can.
translation.zh: 哦 你们不相信我 我真的可以

translation.en: -Milk? -Oh, no,

translation.en: I won't be drinking much milk in the near future.

translation.en: Ma, great turkey.

translation.en: -[Amy] Thanks, honey. -[Ben] Don't eat too much,
translation.zh: -妈 火鸡烧得真好-别吃太多了 我们得去为牲口喂食 别吃撑着了

translation.en: we got some feeding to do later and I don't need you boys in a turkey coma.

translation.en: -[John] All right. -You've got more work?

translation.en: Yeah. Twenty-four hours a day.

translation.en: -Really? -Have to.
translation.zh: -是啊 一天24小时-真的 -不得不这么做-如果你不挤奶

translation.en: -No. -It happened over at Frank Monahan's.

translation.en: -Did you actually see it happen, Mikey? -[Mike] No.

translation.zh: -不是-你真是个坏小子 听着 我们得比那些工业化的 多干两倍的活

translation.en: just to stay afloat.

translation.en: No, I'm interested.

translation.en: What the big boys need to understand is that we're all interdependent.

translation.en: And if somebody loses, eventually, we'll all lose.

translation.en: -What? -Nothing.

translation.en: [John] Thanks, Dad.

translation.en: -[Mike] Yeah. -That's right, I said it, you're too good-looking.
translation.zh: -对-是啊 你太帅了

translation.en: -I'm not that good-looking. -Yeah, I'd say he's pretty good-looking.
translation.zh: -我没你们说的那么帅-他是很帅

translation.en: -[both] Yeah. -You're pretty good-looking.
translation.zh: -我没你们说的那么帅-他是很帅 -你是很帅-对

translation.en: -[all] Yeah. -Okay, yeah.

translation.en: -Guys. -[all laughing]

translation.en: If you combine that with the accent and your little Euro charm,

translation.en: -I mean, I don't know anyone from Denmark. -[Mike] No, no.

translation.en: I've never even heard of anyone from there. Have you?

translation.en: Yeah. Sure.

translation.en: Eddie.
translation.zh: 埃迪

translation.en: Kierkegaard, Niels Bohr, Hans Christian Andersen.
translation.zh: 珂珂汗·贝尔·尼尔索德 汉斯·克里斯蒂安·安德森

translation.en: Uh, Lars Ulrich.
translation.zh: 兰斯·安瑞琪

translation.en: -From Metallica? -From Metallica.
translation.zh: -重金属人？-对重金属人

translation.en: -Get out! -Okay.

translation.en: And uh, Helena Christensen.
translation.zh: -还有海伦·克里斯蒂安-等一下

translation.en: Whoa, whoa, whoa, wait a second.
translation.zh: -还有海伦·克里斯蒂安-等一下 -是不是那个维秘模特？-是的

translation.en: -[John] The Victoria's Secret model? -Yes.
translation.zh: -是不是那个维秘模特？-是的

translation.en: [Mike] Okay. Okay, that's gotta be like the coolest country
translation.zh: 现在丹麦已经是我心里世上最酷的国家了

translation.en: -in the world. -Seriously! You should be a super-power!
translation.zh: 你是个大人物

translation.en: -[all laughing] -[Eddie] Yes.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: [announcer] Welcome, ladies and gentlemen to the Manitowoc County Fairgrounds.
translation.zh: 各位先生女士欢迎来到乡村赛车大赛

translation.en: It's a beautiful day for racing,
translation.zh: 今天天气很不错

translation.en: and the Tenth Annual Mad Mower Derby.
translation.zh: 这是第十届比赛了

translation.en: Give 'em a hand. We got the seniors' class.
translation.zh: 让我们掌声鼓励一下老年组的比赛

translation.en: We've got machines up to 15 horsepower.
translation.zh: 这组的赛车 有15马力的动力 路况好的话可以达到8-12英里每小时

translation.en: They'll be blasting by the grandstand at nearly eight to 12 miles an hour,
translation.zh: 路况好的话可以达到8-12英里每小时

translation.en: -so hang on to your hats when they come by, folks. -[people shouting indistinctly]
translation.zh: 所以 当他们开过的时候 小心按着你们的帽子

translation.en: -Let them hear it when they come past the stands here. -[John] Whoo!
translation.zh: 当选手开过司令台的时候 大家一起鼓掌吧

translation.en: Peterson's coming out of the pit.
translation.zh: 皮德森从那个坑里开出来了

translation.en: -Look at him go around that corner. -[clapping]
translation.zh: 看 他在转角那儿

translation.en: -[engine roaring] -[Mike] Come on, come on.
translation.zh: -加油-我们今天有大动作了

translation.en: Check it out. Kopetsky.
translation.zh: 看那个 卡巴斯基

translation.en: What's up, Keith?
translation.zh: 怎么了 凯斯？

translation.en: What the hell did you do to that thing?
translation.zh: 你对那家伙干什么了？

translation.en: I bumped up the compression and a few other little modifications.
translation.zh: 我把柴油机的油压提升了一点 还做了些别的改进

translation.en: All right, one lap to go, folks. Let them hear it now.
translation.zh: 好了 还有最后一圈 伙计们 掌声再热烈一点

translation.en: The last of the five laps here in the senior class.
translation.zh: 老年组五圈比赛的最后一圈了

translation.en: Osterhouse is pushing. Now Peterson's moving up.
translation.zh: 奥特豪斯正在努力赶超 现在皮德森上来了

translation.en: He's making his move. He's making his move. Here he comes now.
translation.zh: 他正在加速 他来了

translation.en: -And here comes Thompson. There goes Peterson! -[crowd cheering]
translation.zh: 现在汤普森来了 然后是皮德森

translation.en: Go, Mr. Peterson!
translation.zh: 冲刺皮德森

translation.en: That's Mr. Peterson?
translation.zh: -那是皮德森先生-他太老了

translation.en: -He's so damn old! -[both laughing]
translation.zh: -那是皮德森先生-他太老了 老年组的比赛真是精彩

translation.en: [announcer] What a good, clean race we had for the seniors.
translation.zh: 老年组的比赛真是精彩

translation.en: Your brothers seem to like him.
translation.zh: -你的弟弟们好象很喜欢他-妈

translation.en: -Mom. -I like him too.
translation.zh: -你的弟弟们好象很喜欢他-妈 -我也挺喜欢他-是 我看出来了

translation.en: Yeah, I get that.
translation.zh: -我也挺喜欢他-是 我看出来了

translation.en: I really can't afford any distractions right now.
translation.zh: 但现在 我不能分心

translation.en: Chemistry isn't just in a class, kiddo.
translation.zh: 孩子 并不是只有在课堂里才有化学反应

translation.en: And you guys have it.
translation.zh: -你和他之间也有-对

translation.en: Right. And then what happens? I fool myself into thinking he's Prince Charming...
translation.zh: -你和他之间也有-对 那又如何 我骗我自己说 他像个王子一样

translation.en: We get married and live happily ever after?
translation.zh: 我们结婚 从此幸福地生活

translation.en: Then all my hard work goes down the drain because I'm too busy
translation.zh: 然后我所有的努力都白废了 因为我要忙着买家居用品

translation.en: shopping for groceries and picking my kids up at soccer.
translation.zh: 因为我要忙着买家居用品 接孩子回家

translation.en: Sweetie, it really wasn't as bad as all that.
translation.zh: 亲爱的 事实上没你描述得那么糟

translation.en: I didn't mean it that way.
translation.zh: -我不是指那个-我知道

translation.en: I know. But we're not talking about me.
translation.zh: -我不是指那个-我知道 不再说我的事了 好吗？

translation.en: I made my choice.
translation.zh: 我做了自己的选择

translation.en: This is about you making the right choice for you, hmm?
translation.zh: 我们说的是有关你 做对你最有益的选择

translation.en: [announcer] Okay, we're getting ready for the super-modified class.
translation.zh: 好了 现在开始超极改装组的比赛

translation.en: -[engines revving] -Okay, your brothers are getting out there.
translation.zh: 好了 你的弟弟们上场了

translation.en: We have a Le Mans-style start.
translation.zh: 我们开始真正的男人的较量

translation.en: The engines will be off. The drivers, on the gun,
translation.zh: 先关上引擎 司机请就位

translation.en: will be running on foot, across the track.
translation.zh: 所有的人请离开赛道

translation.en: -Go, Eddie! -Onto the mowers,
translation.zh: -加油 埃迪-车手在车道另一边

translation.en: start the mowers and start racing.
translation.zh: 点火 然后出发

translation.en: All right, this one's for all the marbles.
translation.zh: 行了 这个是终极比赛

translation.en: And they've set themselves up on the line now.
translation.zh: 他们已经在出发线前就位了

translation.en: Boys, you've been waiting all summer for this.
translation.zh: 伙计们 你们已经准备了一个夏天了

translation.en: They're getting ready. They're champing at the bit, folks.
translation.zh: 现在他们准备好了 为争夺冠军而比赛

translation.en: All set. Listen for the gun to start it off!
translation.zh: 行了 听发令枪 准备出发

translation.en: -[Eddie chuckles] -[Keith] Shut up. -[shot fired] -[announcer] And they're off. There they go.
translation.zh: -闭嘴-他们出发了

translation.en: -Williams and Kopetsky collide. -[Paige] Hurry up.
translation.zh: -威廉姆和卡巴斯基撞在一起了-起来

translation.en: Williams is on the ground. Get out of there before they run you over!
translation.zh: 威廉姆倒在地上了 快离开那儿 别让车撞到

translation.en: They're firing the machines up now. Number five is up.
translation.zh: 他们现在开始点火了 五号车已经启动了

translation.en: Kopetsky pulls right out.
translation.zh: 7号车也启动了 卡巴斯基开出来了

translation.en: Looks like Williams is having trouble getting his engine going.
translation.zh: 看上去威廉姆的车有点麻烦

translation.en: And as they head into the first turn,
translation.zh: 他们驶向第一个弯道

translation.en: Kopetsky on number eight is in the lead.
translation.zh: 卡巴斯基的8号车现在领先

translation.en: Look at that. Williams got it running.
translation.zh: 看 威廉姆终于发动了

translation.en: But he's got a long way to go.
translation.zh: 不过他已经落后很多了

translation.en: Go, go, go, go, go!
translation.zh: 上啊

translation.en: Looks like the Morgan brothers are really challenging Kopetsky there.
translation.zh: 现在摩根兄弟正在和卡巴斯基决逐

translation.en: They're chasing him down.
translation.zh: 他们紧紧咬住了领先者

translation.en: -Get off my tail! -[announcer] Mike Morgan on Moovover, second.
translation.zh: 在后面吃灰吧 迈克·摩根 现在是第二位

translation.en: And his brother, John, on number seven, is right behind him.
translation.zh: 他的弟弟乔治开7号车 紧随其后

translation.en: Williams now, he on the track, he's catching up.
translation.zh: 威廉姆现在在追赶大部队

translation.en: At the back of the pack, he's starting to move up nicely.
translation.zh: 离大队还有一段距离 不过他开得很快

translation.en: And he's putting on some real speed, but he is way behind.
translation.zh: 他速度很快 不过还落后太多

translation.en: And it looks like we've got a duel shaping up in front of the pack.
translation.zh: 似乎领头的一组出现三雄决逐的场面

translation.en: Mike Morgan is really going after Kopetsky.
translation.zh: 迈克·摩根正在紧咬领先都

translation.en: -[Kopetsky] Eat it, Morgan! -Watch it!
translation.zh: -吃灰吧 摩根-看着 他把摩根撞向了草堆

translation.en: -Whoa! -He pushed Morgan towards the hay bale there.
translation.zh: 他把摩根撞向了草堆

translation.en: It looks like he pushed him right off the track.
translation.zh: 一下子就把他撞离赛道了

translation.en: [Mike] Damn! Damn!

translation.en: [announcer] Keep it clean there, Kopetsky.
translation.zh: 开车别那么野蛮 卡巴斯基

translation.en: John Morgan is moving up there now, to see if he can
translation.zh: 乔治 摩根现在赶上来了 看看他能不能赶上领先的卡巴斯基

translation.en: snatch the lead away from Kopetsky.
translation.zh: 看看他能不能赶上领先的卡巴斯基

translation.en: -Come on, Eddie! -Go!
translation.zh: -加油 埃迪-快

translation.en: [announcer] And here comes Williams on number nine!
translation.zh: 9号的威廉姆也超过来了

translation.en: He's catching up. This could be a three-way race, folks.
translation.zh: 他赶上来了又恢复了三雄决逐的场面

translation.en: -[Paige] Go, go, go! -[Amy and Ben cheering]
translation.zh: -上啊-超越他

translation.en: Kopetsky is trying to hold him off now,
translation.zh: 卡巴斯基 正试图挡住他的路线

translation.en: weaving back and forth to the inside.

translation.en: Williams trying to go outside, now trying to cut inside.
translation.zh: 威廉姆想走外线 现在又试图走内线超越

translation.en: Kopetsky will have none of it. He's holding him off. One lap to go.

translation.en: Let them hear it, folks. Going around the third corner...

translation.en: Go! Go! Go!
translation.zh: 加油

translation.en: Williams, the rookie, is really out for the gold.
translation.zh: 威廉姆 开始向金牌冲刺

translation.en: He's coming after Kopetsky on the inside.
translation.zh: 他正试图从内线超越卡巴斯基

translation.en: Kopetsky is trying to hold him off with some quick moves.

translation.en: Watch out for him, Williams. He'll mess with you.

translation.en: It's Kopetsky and Williams now.

translation.en: [announcer] Williams is done!

translation.en: Williams is coming in first!

translation.en: Williams, the first-time rookie rider, takes the championship of the super-modifiers.

translation.en: [chuckles] That's great.

translation.en: It's stupid. He said it was for the marbles.

translation.en: I won them. I'm going to keep them.

translation.en: -Hey, you! -Ah, fine race, sir.
translation.zh: -我赢来的 我想保留一下-喂 你 赛得漂亮 先生

translation.en: -[impact grunt] -[Paige] Hey!

translation.en: Right. I'm gonna kick your ass.

translation.en: -Just try. -[John and Mike grunt]

translation.en: Mike.

translation.en: -[Paige] Are you okay? -[Eddie] Yes.

translation.en: [Paige] Come here. Come over here.

translation.en: Still think we should have stopped at that biker bar.

translation.en: Shown 'em your hog. [soft chuckle]

translation.en: Why?

translation.en: Are you trying to set some kind of record of how many times

translation.en: I can get beaten up in one night?

translation.en: -He still would have punched you. -[scoffs]

translation.en: Sorry, Ed.

translation.en: That we're involved.

translation.en: Which we're not.

translation.en: No. Definitely not.

translation.en: Which is why I'm going to walk you to your door,

translation.en: and bid you goodnight.

translation.en: 'Cause that's my name.

translation.en: -[cameras clicking] -[indistinct shouting]

translation.en: but he knew it was his fate long before she even tried.

translation.en: Destiny is not something that you can fight against.

translation.en: or did Iago create the circumstance?

translation.en: I think it's both. On the surface, Iago is the bad guy,

translation.en: but if we look closer, we see that the crack Iago exploited

translation.en: was of Othello's own making.

translation.en: But still, Othello made choices.

translation.en: Bad ones.

translation.en: Othello had love, but he chose not to listen to his heart.

translation.en: Love doesn't come around every day, and when it does,

translation.en: because the most important thing is to be with him.

translation.en: [man] Eddie, it's Paige Morgan!

translation.en: [man] Paige Morgan!
translation.zh: 佩吉·摩根

translation.en: Eddie! Eddie!
translation.zh: 埃迪

translation.en: [announcer] His Royal Highness, the Crown Prince, and a guest.
translation.zh: 皇太子殿下 还有一个客人

translation.en: -Just wait here. -[sighs] Okay.
translation.zh: -在这儿等一下-好

translation.en: I now proclaim this session of Parliament open.
translation.zh: 我宣布 国会的这个议程正式开始

translation.en: Come on, let's go.
translation.zh: 我们走

translation.en: -Oh, no. -What?
translation.zh: -糟糕-怎么了？

translation.en: You didn't tell me you lived with your parents.
translation.zh: 你没告诉过我你和父母住在一起

translation.en: -Hi. -My word.
translation.zh: -你好-欢迎你

translation.en: -Miss Paige. -Oh, Soren!
translation.zh: -佩吉女士-索尔

translation.en: Oh, hugging the help?
translation.zh: 拥抱一下吧

translation.en: You're going to fit in very well around here.
translation.zh: 你会喜欢这儿的

translation.en: Right. I will see you in a moment.
translation.zh: 对 一会儿再见

translation.en: And Soren will show you where to go.
translation.zh: 索尔会先带你转转

translation.en: -May I? -Absolutely.
translation.zh: -可以吗？-当然

translation.en: My pleasure.
translation.zh: 很荣幸

translation.en: This, uh, is the south courtyard.
translation.zh: 这是南广场

translation.en: You, of course, came through the private gate.
translation.zh: 你 当然就从私人来访的门进去

translation.en: Hi. -Miss Paige. -Right. Hi.
translation.zh: -嗨-佩吉小姐

translation.en: -[Paige exclaims] -This is where we keep the mops.
translation.zh: 这是我们放拖把的地方

translation.en: -Absolutely not! -I love her and she loves me,
translation.zh: -绝对不行-我爱她 她也爱我 -绝对不行-我爱她 她也爱我

translation.en: -and we will do as we please. -Oh, love.
translation.zh: -我们自己愿意就行-爱情啊

translation.en: And when has it ever been about that?
translation.zh: 是从什么时候开始的？

translation.en: Mother, it has taken us a lot to get where we are today.
translation.zh: 我们相处了很久才相爱

translation.en: All we want is the chance to be together.
translation.zh: 我们只想永远在一起

translation.en: It has taken you a lot to get to where you are?
translation.zh: 我们相处了很久才相爱

translation.en: -It has taken us 1,200 years... -[scoffs] ...to get to where we are.
translation.zh: 我们家族存在了1200年能有今天的地位

translation.en: In a few weeks' time, you will ascend the throne as king,
translation.zh: 再过几星期 你就将晋位为国王了

translation.en: and I will let nothing stand in the way of that.
translation.zh: 我绝不允许多生枝节

translation.en: Certainly not some tawdry little affair
translation.zh: 当然不会允许那个 俗气的一心做梦想做另一个灰姑娘

translation.en: with a gold-digging American girl
translation.zh: 俗气的一心做梦想做另一个灰姑娘

translation.en: who dreams of becoming the next Princess Di.
translation.zh: 的美国乡下姑娘得逞

translation.en: Mother, you cannot tell me whom to love and how to live my life.
translation.zh: 妈妈 你不能强迫我该爱谁

translation.en: Edvard, I am sure she has outstanding qualities.
translation.zh: 爱德华 我知道她是个优秀的女人

translation.en: But once the news of your father's illness becomes public,
translation.zh: 但是你父亲的病情一旦见报 人们需要重建对皇室的信心

translation.en: the people will require reassurance.
translation.zh: 人们需要重建对皇室的信心

translation.en: Yes, and I will proudly and confidently ascend the throne.
translation.zh: 当然 我会自信 自豪地继承王位

translation.en: -Good. -As soon as you allow me to choose my own bride.
translation.zh: -那就好-前提是你让我自己 挑选我的新娘

translation.en: Out of the question.
translation.zh: 这不作考虑

translation.en: She is a commoner.
translation.zh: 她只是个平民

translation.en: Well, then I hope you think that Arabella is fit to be the queen
translation.zh: 好 那你就期待12岁的爱拉贝拉

translation.en: at the age of 12.
translation.zh: 能做一个合格的女王吧

translation.en: Oh, no, I'm forgetting... I'm forgetting about Nestor.
translation.zh: 我忘了还有恩斯特

translation.en: Oh, don't threaten us!
translation.zh: 别来威胁我们

translation.en: Cousin Bartholomew's idiot son, Nestor.
translation.zh: 贝丝罗门姨夫的白痴儿子恩斯特

translation.en: The 47-year-old virgin in diapers.
translation.zh: 那个47岁还带尿布的童子鸡

translation.en: -Oh, the people will rejoice. -Enough!
translation.zh: 哈 人们会喜欢他的 够了

translation.en: Edvard, you will be the next king of Denmark.
translation.zh: 爱德华 你一定要做丹麦的下一任国王

translation.en: -Do you hear me? -Yes, sir.
translation.zh: -听明白没有？-明白了

translation.en: Now, about your young lady.
translation.zh: 至于你的小姑娘

translation.en: If you say you love her as you do,
translation.zh: 要是你真像你说得那么爱她

translation.en: and you believe she will make you happy, then marry her.
translation.zh: 而且你确信她会给你幸福 你就娶她吧

translation.en: [Queen Rosalind] Haraald, you can't mean that.
translation.zh: 哈兰德 你不能同意这事

translation.en: Maybe this is not a good time to discuss...
translation.zh: 或许现在讨论这个还不合适

translation.en: No, it's a perfect time.
translation.zh: 不 现在正合适

translation.en: It is at the end of a man's life when he realizes...
translation.zh: 男人在生命快要结束的时候 才意识到

translation.en: How important his decisions were at the beginning.
translation.zh: 最初做的决定有多重要

translation.en: [Soren] And in 1502, King Gustav IV fell, hit his head on a rock,
translation.zh: 在1502年 国王盖斯泰维四世摔了一跤 头撞在石头上了

translation.en: had his famous moment of enlightenment.
translation.zh: 然后 他宣称在那时

translation.en: Claimed that he saw God at the bottom of this lake.
translation.zh: 他看到上帝就生活在这湖底

translation.en: He went charging off through the castle to tell everyone.
translation.zh: 他跌跌撞撞地跑出城堡告诉所有人

translation.en: Unfortunately, he was carrying a torch.
translation.zh: 不幸的是 他手上拿着火把

translation.en: Curtains caught fire, burned down half the palace.
translation.zh: 引着了窗帘 半个宫殿都被烧掉了

translation.en: Thus, observe the new wing.
translation.zh: 所以 我们今天就有了新的一半皇宫

translation.en: [Eddie] He takes great pleasure in twisting my ancestors' history.
translation.zh: 他肯定在嚼我祖先的舌头

translation.en: Today has been the most incredible day of my life.
translation.zh: 今天是我生命中最不可思议的一天

translation.en: Come with me.
translation.zh: 跟我来

translation.en: I have something important to tell you.
translation.zh: 我有件很重要事要告诉你

translation.en: Yeah?
translation.zh: 是吗？

translation.en: The reason I had to come back...
translation.zh: 我回丹麦的原因

translation.en: Is because my father has decided to pass the crown to me.
translation.zh: 是因为我父亲决定要传位给我

translation.en: So you're gonna be king.
translation.zh: 就是说 你将成为国王

translation.en: Yes.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: I love you so much.
translation.zh: 我很爱你

translation.en: And I know the sacrifices you would have to make.
translation.zh: 而且我也知道你将要做出多大的牺牲

translation.en: What are you doing?
translation.zh: 你在干什么？

translation.en: Paige Morgan...
translation.zh: 佩吉·摩根

translation.en: Will you marry me?
translation.zh: 你愿意嫁给我吗？

translation.en: Yes.
translation.zh: 我愿意

translation.en: Oh, good morning.
translation.zh: 早上好

translation.en: -Good morning, ma'am. -Good morning, ma'am.
translation.zh: -早上好 太太-早上好

translation.en: -Coffee? -Oh, I can get it myself
translation.zh: -要咖啡吗？-我可以自己来

translation.en: if you show me where the kitchen is.
translation.zh: 告诉我厨房在哪儿就行

translation.en: Or a Starbucks?
translation.zh: 或者告诉我星巴克在哪

translation.en: Grande decaf nonfat latte?
translation.zh: 无咖啡因的 加脱脂奶

translation.en: Yes, ma'am.
translation.zh: 好的 太太

translation.en: Congratulations!
translation.zh: 恭喜你

translation.en: You and Edvard getting married, it's so romantic!
translation.zh: 你和爱德华要结婚了 好浪漫啊

translation.en: -You must be Arabella. -Call me Ari.
translation.zh: -你一定是爱拉贝拉-叫我艾莉就行

translation.en: Isn't it wonderful? We're going to be sisters.
translation.zh: 多好啊 我们将成为姐妹了

translation.en: More hugging?
translation.zh: 又在和人拥抱

translation.en: -Whatever will we do with you? -Thank you.
translation.zh: -我们可以帮你安排一下吗？-谢谢

translation.en: Well, then, I thought we might run through your schedule for the day.
translation.zh: 好吧 我先把今天一天的安排向你报告一下

translation.en: I have a schedule?
translation.zh: 我一天的安排

translation.en: -As of this morning you do. -Come on.
translation.zh: 今天早上你有安排 来

translation.en: At 9:00, you have a groundbreaking with Edvard.
translation.zh: 9:00 你要和爱德华出席一个开幕式

translation.en: Also attending will be Countess Yungen.
translation.zh: 犹根伯爵夫人也会一起去

translation.en: Remember, if you're facing her, the good eye is the left one.
translation.zh: 记着 要是你面对她站着的话 左边那只眼是好的

translation.en: At 10:15, there's a photo opportunity,
translation.zh: 10:15是记者拍照时间

translation.en: holding hands with Edvard on the royal yacht.
translation.zh: 你要和爱德华在皇家游艇上手牵手

translation.en: Opening of a Miro exhibit at the museum at noon.
translation.zh: 中午在博物馆宣布米罗展开幕

translation.en: 12:40 is when you can call your parents.
translation.zh: 12:40给你父母打电话

translation.en: Yes, a 1:00 luncheon with the Queen.
translation.zh: 然后 1:00和皇后共进午餐

translation.en: -Deep breaths. -[exhales sharply]
translation.zh: 深呼吸

translation.en: You'll get through this in spectacular fashion.
translation.zh: 你必须很好地做完这些的

translation.en: After all, that's what the people expect of our future queen.
translation.zh: 无论如何 民众希望他们的皇后能做好这些

translation.en: Oh, my God.
translation.zh: 天啊

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: "Queen."
translation.zh: 皇后

translation.en: I mean, I knew it worked that way,
translation.zh: 我意思是 我知道是这样

translation.en: but I... I hadn't really thought about it like that.
translation.zh: 但我从来没有真的想会真的变成这样

translation.en: Do you think that people are gonna mind if I'm gonna be their queen
translation.zh: 你觉得人们会接受我做他们的皇后吗？

translation.en: and all I've seen is the airport?
translation.zh: 而从此以后我能看到的就只有机场了

translation.en: -No. -Mmm-mmm.
translation.zh: 不

translation.en: Anna.
translation.zh: 安娜

translation.en: Do you a have dress for Eddie's coronation ball yet?
translation.zh: 埃迪的加冤仪式的衣服你准备好了吗？

translation.en: -Um, no. -You may come in now. Hello, sweetheart.
translation.zh: -没有-你们可以进来了

translation.en: This is Margueritte. She can design anything you like.
translation.zh: 这是玛格丽特 她可以帮你设计任何你喜欢的衣服

translation.en: Chanel, Dior, Armani, Prada.
translation.zh: 香奈尔 迪奥 阿玛妮 普拉达

translation.en: -It's very nice to meet you. -Turn.
translation.zh: -很高兴见到你-转身

translation.en: -Excuse me? -Turn.
translation.zh: 什么？ 转身

translation.en: Come, ladies.
translation.zh: 女士们 过来

translation.en: Long torso.
translation.zh: 上半身长

translation.en: Good figure.
translation.zh: 身材不错

translation.en: Terrible American posture.
translation.zh: 糟糕的美国式的站姿

translation.en: I don't work with hunchbacks.
translation.zh: 别把背拱起来

translation.en: [Reporter] When is the wedding, Miss Morgan? Good morning.
translation.zh: 摩根小姐 婚礼定在什么时候？

translation.en: When these plants are completed,
translation.zh: 当这些树长成的时候

translation.en: Denmark will lead the European community
translation.zh: 丹麦的植物油和乳酪产量

translation.en: in vegetable oil and specialty fat production.
translation.zh: 将会成为欧洲第一

translation.en: Farm girl.
translation.zh: 我是家村女孩

translation.en: [Paige] So where do the future king and queen go on their honeymoon?
translation.zh: 示来的国王和皇后去哪儿渡蜜月

translation.en: I was thinking Morocco.
translation.zh: 摩洛哥怎么样？

translation.en: [Eddie] Mmm. It's really hard to organize security there.
translation.zh: 那儿保安条件太差了

translation.en: [Paige] Oh, right. Okay.
translation.zh: 那好吧

translation.en: Uh, what about Spain?
translation.zh: 西班牙怎么样？

translation.en: Mmm. Yes, Spain is good.
translation.zh: 西班牙怎么样？ 好 西班牙不错

translation.en: I'm sure King Juan Carlos won't mind lending us his private island
translation.zh: 胡安卡洛斯国王不会介意 在夏天

translation.en: for a few weeks in the summer.
translation.zh: 胡安卡洛斯国王不会介意 在夏天 把他的私人小岛借给我们几个星期的

translation.en: I swear.
translation.zh: 我保证

translation.en: [Margueritte] Well, it's hanging well in the front.
translation.zh: 前摆很不错

translation.en: Is this part supposed to be loose?
translation.zh: 这里应该是这么松吗？

translation.en: -She doesn't speak. -At all?
translation.zh: -她不说话的-哑巴

translation.en: -To you. -Oh.
translation.zh: 不和你说话

translation.en: Well, is this part supposed to be loose?
translation.zh: 好吧 这里应该是这么松吗？

translation.en: Well, it has been worn that way for the past 200 years.
translation.zh: 过去200年都是这么穿的

translation.en: The opening of this new wing of the Dangard Pediatric Hospital...
translation.zh: 庆祝德兰德儿童医院成立

translation.en: -Where's Paige? -I don't know.
translation.zh: -佩吉在哪儿？-我不知道

translation.en: [Queen Rosalind] ...our country's commitment to improving healthcare
translation.zh: 我们国家对于提高民众的医疗

translation.en: for all of our people...
translation.zh: 水平的重视

translation.en: There she is.
translation.zh: 她在那儿

translation.en: I was just being nice to some kids.
translation.zh: 我只是对孩子们友好一点

translation.en: Which every paper felt compelled to report.
translation.zh: 这占满了所有的报纸

translation.en: [Paige] Well, what's wrong with that?
translation.zh: 那有什么不对的吗？

translation.en: That you did it in a new, state-of-the-art, government-funded,
translation.zh: 这是一所政府支持的

translation.en: billion-kroner hospital,
translation.zh: 亿万资金投入的新医院

translation.en: which suddenly all these newspapers have no interest in mentioning.
translation.zh: 而你所做的 让公众对这间医院失去了兴趣

translation.en: We had an opportunity on the eve of a national strike,
translation.zh: 我们好不容易在全国性大罢工的前夜

translation.en: to show the people what their healthcare system can do for them.
translation.zh: 有机会可以让公众看到 医疗系统可以给予他们保障

translation.en: Instead, all they know is that you are nice to children.
translation.zh: 然而 现在他们注意的 就只是你会对孩子们很友好

translation.en: I'm sorry. I... I'm trying.
translation.zh: 对不起 我试图做好

translation.en: It's gonna take me a while to get the hang of things.
translation.zh: 要给我一点时间才能适应这种生活

translation.en: Being royal is not like being famous or being rich.
translation.zh: 做为皇室成员 并不是象出名或是有钱那么简单

translation.en: It is something much, much more.
translation.zh: 她有更多的内涵

translation.en: It is a way of being that can only be learned from birth.
translation.zh: 你必须完全从头学起

translation.en: It is an embodiment
translation.zh: 变成一种化身

translation.en: which requires you to sacrifice who you are for who you must be.
translation.zh: 这需要你完全牺牲自我 成为你必须变成的人

translation.en: Well, I'm Paige Morgan from Manitowoc, Wisconsin.
translation.zh: 我是佩吉·摩根 我是威斯康新人

translation.en: Paige Morgan can no longer exist.
translation.zh: 佩吉·摩根不可以再存在了

translation.en: She is gone.
translation.zh: 她消失了

translation.en: You are now the future queen of Denmark...
translation.zh: 你现在是未来的丹麦皇后

translation.en: Plain and simple.
translation.zh: 就这么简单

translation.en: Excuse me, Your Majesty.
translation.zh: 对不起 陛下

translation.en: Your Royal Highness, it's time to leave.
translation.zh: 殿下 你该离开了

translation.en: [Eddie] All right. Thank you, Soren.
translation.zh: 好的 谢谢 索尔

translation.en: His Royal Highness, the Crown Prince.
translation.zh: 皇太子殿下

translation.en: -Royal Highness. -Prime Minister.
translation.zh: -殿下-首相

translation.en: Good morning, ladies and gentlemen.
translation.zh: 早上好 各位先生女士

translation.en: In the interest of expedience, I've asked the lead negotiator for the national unions...
translation.zh: 为方便起见 我邀请了国家工会的首席谈判代表

translation.en: -Good morning. -...and the lead negotiator for our nation's corporate interests to join us.
translation.zh: 和国家工业联盟的首席谈判代表一起来参加会议

translation.en: Good morning.
translation.zh: 早上好

translation.en: [man 1] I'm very pleased to meet you. [man 2] Nice to meet you again.
translation.zh: -很高兴见到你-很高兴再见到你

translation.en: [Anderson] Your Royal Highness.
translation.zh: 殿下

translation.en: I know your exposure to these proceedings has been rather limited...
translation.zh: 我知道你很少出席这些声合

translation.en: Mr. Anderson, I'm well aware of the traditions
translation.zh: 安德森先生 我很清楚这种会议的

translation.en: and the protocols of this chamber, and while I respect them,
translation.zh: 程序和传统方式 我也尊重这些方式

translation.en: we only have six hours before all hell breaks loose.
translation.zh: 在这见鬼的罢工开始之前 我们只有6个小时了

translation.en: So don't you think the time for gamesmanship has passed?
translation.zh: 所以我们是不是该别绕弯子了？

translation.en: -Yes, sir. -Then we are in agreement.
translation.zh: -是 殿下-那我们算是达成一致了

translation.en: Please be seated.
translation.zh: 请坐

translation.en: And get comfortable...
translation.zh: 坐舒服点

translation.en: Because we're not leaving here until this is solved.
translation.zh: 在这事解决之前 我们不能离开这里

translation.en: -[man 1] And where will this additional money come from? -[man 2] No, no, no!
translation.zh: 这些多余的钱能从哪儿来

translation.en: [man 3] Well, perhaps management will tighten their belts.
translation.zh: 管理层可以所裤腰带勒紧一点

translation.en: -[man 1] Our belts? -[man 3] Yes! It might do you some good
translation.zh: 勒紧我们的裤腰带 是的 这对你们有好处

translation.en: -to go without. -[man 1] These are businesses, not charities.
translation.zh: -不行-我们是做生意 不是慈善机构

translation.en: [Prime Minister] If we can't come to a resolution about wages,
translation.zh: 要是我们不能就工资达成协议

translation.en: perhaps we can discuss concessions on benefits.
translation.zh: 那我们能不能在福利待遇上让一点步

translation.en: -No concessions! -You take and take
translation.zh: -不能让步-你们不停地索取

translation.en: -and will give nothing in return! -You are impossible!
translation.zh: -确一点也不肯付出-那是不可能的

translation.en: Gentlemen, please. Let's remember this is not about us.
translation.zh: 各位 请注意 这并不仅仅是为了我们自己

translation.en: You know, when I was in America,
translation.zh: 当我在美国的时候

translation.en: I, um... I spent some time with Paige's family on her farm. Oh.
translation.zh: 我和佩吉一家在她家的农场呆了几天

translation.en: [Eddie] And they explained something to me.
translation.zh: 他们告诉我一些事情

translation.en: That we are all interdependent.
translation.zh: 他们是互相依存的

translation.en: So we had better start caring for our opposition
translation.zh: 所以 我们最好为对方想一下

translation.en: as much as we do for ourselves.
translation.zh: 就象我们为自己着想一样

translation.en: I wonder if anyone on this table knows
translation.zh: 我觉得 要是在这张桌子上的每个人

translation.en: what it's like to work for a tiny wage.
translation.zh: 都能体会为一份菲薄的工资而工作

translation.en: And then to see that wage get sliced up even further by taxes.
translation.zh: 而这一点点酬劳还会因为税收而变得更少

translation.en: Now, I can tell you from experience,
translation.zh: 根据我的经验

translation.en: it can be a mighty struggle.
translation.zh: 人们就会展开一场坚决的斗争

translation.en: But then I suspect it would be substantially more difficult
translation.zh: 然而一旦斗争开始 罢工的人们得到工作的机会反会更小

translation.en: to see your job
translation.zh: 罢工的人们得到工作的机会反会更小

translation.en: and your benefits disappear altogether.
translation.zh: 他们的福利也会一起失去

translation.en: Now, at the moment, we are six percent apart. Correct?
translation.zh: 所以现在我们的分歧还有6个百分点 对吗？

translation.en: Now, if the goal is to let the workers keep more
translation.zh: 如果我们的目的是让工人能拿到更多

translation.en: without damaging the corporation,
translation.zh: 但又不损害企业的根本

translation.en: then perhaps there's a third path to consider.
translation.zh: 那可能我们应该考虑第三条路

translation.en: He was brilliant.
translation.zh: 他太聪明了 他让工会降低了要求

translation.en: He got the unions to lower their demands,
translation.zh: 他太聪明了 他让工会降低了要求 而企业则放宽了限制

translation.en: and the corporations to raise their offer,
translation.zh: 而企业则放宽了限制 然后让议会通过决议 减少工人的税收

translation.en: and then he got Parliament to cut the workers' wage tax to make up the difference.
translation.zh: 然后让议会通过决议 减少工人的税收 于是分歧就停止了

translation.en: Now, that's impressive.
translation.zh: 那太精彩了

translation.en: Okay, about the dress.
translation.zh: 好了 说这件衣服

translation.en: Am I supposed to be able to breathe?
translation.zh: 我有点呼吸不过来 这是不是正常的

translation.en: -No. -Oh, well, then it's perfect.
translation.zh: 完全正常 那这衣服一点问题也没有了

translation.en: Miss Paige, the Queen would like to see you immediately.
translation.zh: 佩吉小姐 皇后要立刻见你

translation.en: Don't worry. I'll be by your side the entire time.
translation.zh: 别担心 我会全程陪着你的

translation.en: -Soren, get out. -Yes, Your Majesty.
translation.zh: -索尔 出去-好的 陛下

translation.en: [Paige] Thanks.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: [Queen Rosalind] These are my new babies.
translation.zh: 这些是我新的宝贝

translation.en: My new hopefuls.
translation.zh: 我的新的期待

translation.en: I know you think I don't like you.
translation.zh: 我知道你觉得我不喜欢你

translation.en: [Queen Rosalind] I like traditions.
translation.zh: 我喜欢传统

translation.en: I like traditions,
translation.zh: 我喜欢传统

translation.en: and I like consistency and continuity,
translation.zh: 而且我喜欢连贯和延续

translation.en: and I don't like change.
translation.zh: 不喜欢变化

translation.en: But...
translation.zh: 不过

translation.en: When that change is for the better...
translation.zh: 如果变化带来的是好的一面

translation.en: When it helps turn a boy into a man,
translation.zh: 能把一个男孩 变成一个成熟的男人

translation.en: then I have to reconsider.
translation.zh: 那我就得重新考虑一下了

translation.en: Two weeks ago, I thought you were the end of the monarchy.
translation.zh: 两周前 我以为你的到来会是皇室的终结

translation.en: Now I see you may be the best thing that ever happened to us.
translation.zh: 现在 我确觉得你是我们的救世主

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: And now we have that settled...
translation.zh: 既然这样

translation.en: We have to make you into the best queen
translation.zh: 我们必须把你变成丹麦

translation.en: that Denmark has ever had.
translation.zh: 有史以来最好的皇后

translation.en: Come with me.
translation.zh: 跟我来

translation.en: Between you and me, Paige,
translation.zh: 这话就和你说 佩吉

translation.en: being queen is not without its charms.
translation.zh: 成为皇后 漂亮是不可少的

translation.en: So, my dear,
translation.zh: 所以 亲爱的

translation.en: what would you like to wear to the coronation ball?
translation.zh: 加冕典礼你想要戴什么？

translation.en: Oh. Very beautiful.
translation.zh: 真漂亮

translation.en: Your ears will be killing you by the end of the evening, though.
translation.zh: 不过 相信我 晚会结束时 你耳朵肯定会痛得不行的

translation.en: Trust me.
translation.zh: 晚会结束时 你耳朵肯定会痛得不行的

translation.en: Harry Winston.
translation.zh: 哈利·沃森

translation.en: It's very appropriate.
translation.zh: 非常感谢

translation.en: -Sorry. Would you excuse me? -[man 1] Certainly, sir.
translation.zh: 对不起 我可以离开一下吗？ 当然 阁下

translation.en: [man 2] Yes, Your Highness.
translation.zh: 是的 殿下

translation.en: Sorry. Pardon me.
translation.zh: 对不起 让一下

translation.en: Paige, may I have this dance?
translation.zh: 佩吉 我可以和你跳这支舞吗？

translation.en: [Paige] Of course.
translation.zh: 当然

translation.en: I hope you don't mind, but I've requested our song.
translation.zh: 希望你不介意 我让他们演奏我们的歌了

translation.en: We have a song?

translation.en: We have a song!
translation.zh: 对 我们的歌

translation.en: Let's go somewhere.

translation.en: It kind of bothers me.
translation.zh: 这儿有点吵

translation.en: Oh, right. Come with me.
translation.zh: 对 跟我来

translation.en: [Soren] Excuse me, sir. I know that you and your father wanted to speak privately
translation.zh: 对不起 殿下 你父亲想和你

translation.en: with the King of Norway before he left.
translation.zh: 还有挪威国王 在离开前 私下谈谈

translation.en: Right, of course. Thank you, Soren.
translation.zh: 对 好 谢谢 索尔

translation.en: Listen, when I get back,
translation.zh: 听着 我回来时

translation.en: I've got a special treat for you.
translation.zh: 我有一个特别服务要送给你

translation.en: Oh, good. I was wondering when I was going to start being treated well.
translation.zh: 好极了 我正在想什么时候才能让你伺候我呢

translation.en: [King Haraald] Edvard.
translation.zh: 爱德华

translation.en: -You remember my son, Edvard? -[Eddie] Very nice to meet you.
translation.zh: 你还记得我的儿子爱德华吗？ 很高兴见到你

translation.en: -Nice to see you again. -[man] You, too.
translation.zh: -很高兴见到你-你也一样

translation.en: Father, I really think you should be sitting down.
translation.zh: 父亲 你应该坐下

translation.en: [man] Did those Egyptian photographers make you pose
translation.zh: 是不是那些埃及摄影师让你

translation.en: for all those photos riding on camels?
translation.zh: 骑着骆驼摆造型拍的

translation.en: -[King Haraald laughing] Yeah. -[man] Interesting creatures.
translation.zh: -是啊-很有趣的动物

translation.en: They store all that water, but they never seem to bathe in it.
translation.zh: 它们存储大量的水份 但好象从不洗澡

translation.en: [King Haraald] Oh, yeah.
translation.zh: 是啊

translation.en: [Eddie] So down to business.
translation.zh: 说正事吧

translation.en: We have to talk about fishing rights.
translation.zh: 我们必须谈谈捕捞权

translation.en: We've both signed a treaty.
translation.zh: 我们都签署了协议

translation.en: The main thing is to maintain stock and to respect...
translation.zh: 重要的是保持渔苗量并尊重

translation.en: Right, I've got something to show you.
translation.zh: 对了 我要给你看点东西

translation.en: Stay there.
translation.zh: 呆着别动

translation.en: Now...
translation.zh: 现在

translation.en: Relax, my dear, as I make you
translation.zh: 放松 新爱的 我将给你

translation.en: the perfect sandwich.
translation.zh: 做一块爱心三明治

translation.en: I think you'll find
translation.zh: 你会发现

translation.en: that the student
translation.zh: 你的学生

translation.en: has now become the teacher.
translation.zh: 现在已经是大师级的手艺了

translation.en: I can see how proud your father is of you.
translation.zh: 可以看出你父亲很为你自豪

translation.en: [Eddie] Yes.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: Eddie, this has all been extraordinary.
translation.zh: 埃迪 这一切都是那么地特别

translation.en: A real-life fairy tale.
translation.zh: 一个现实生活中的童话

translation.en: But I can't do it anymore.
translation.zh: 不过 我再也不能这样下去了

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: What are you saying?
translation.zh: 你说什么？

translation.en: I'm saying I can't stay.
translation.zh: 我不能再待下去了

translation.en: Well, what's the matter?
translation.zh: 发生什么事了？

translation.en: When I first met you,
translation.zh: 当我刚遇见你时

translation.en: I was so focused because I was scared.
translation.zh: 我很害怕 所以全部心神都集中在我们身上

translation.en: And you got me out of that,
translation.zh: 然后你让我不再害怕了

translation.en: which is the greatest thing anyone's ever done for me.
translation.zh: 当然 这是我身上发生的最美妙的事

translation.en: But I'm still me,
translation.zh: 但我还是我 所有我想做的事还是我生活的一部分

translation.en: and all the things that I want to do are still a part of me...
translation.zh: 所有我想做的事还是我生活的一部分

translation.en: And I thought I could make myself forget about that,
translation.zh: 我以为我可以忘了那些事

translation.en: but I can't.
translation.zh: 但我做不到

translation.en: What about us?
translation.zh: 那我们怎么办？

translation.en: You belong here, not me.
translation.zh: 你属于这里 不属于我

translation.en: And your father needs you to be there
translation.zh: 你父亲也需要你留在这儿

translation.en: for your mother and Arabella.
translation.zh: 还有你母亲和爱拉贝拉

translation.en: I mean, is... Is that it? We never see each other again?

translation.en: I don't know.
translation.zh: 我不知道

translation.en: I don't know.
translation.zh: 我不知道

translation.en: I can't make you stay, can I?
translation.zh: 我无法说服你留下来 是吗？

translation.en: [softly] I can't make you stay.
translation.zh: 我不能让你留下来

translation.en: Long live His Majesty, King Edvard III.
translation.zh: 爱德华三世国王陛下万岁

translation.en: Today marks a profound,
translation.zh: 今天 是一个重要

translation.en: though bittersweet, milestone for all of us
translation.zh: 甜密而又里程碑式的日子

translation.en: as we bear witness to both an end and a beginning.
translation.zh: 我们共同见证 一个结束和一个开始

translation.en: And while we must continue on,
translation.zh: 我们不仅要继续生活

translation.en: we must also be grateful
translation.zh: 更要成为一个伟大的国家

translation.en: to have been blessed with someone
translation.zh: 这个国家 是一些人奋斗而来的

translation.en: who has so ably guided us to where we are today.
translation.zh: 他们引导我们走到了今天

translation.en: When there has been so much love
translation.zh: 当我们心中有如此多的爱

translation.en: and happiness for someone,
translation.zh: 和得到的幸福

translation.en: it is natural to be reluctant
translation.zh: 很自然的 我们不愿

translation.en: to close such a wonderful chapter in our lives.
translation.zh: 就此结束这一绚烂的篇章

translation.en: -Excuse me. -For moving forward
translation.zh: -对不起-因为继续向前

translation.en: is rarely accomplished without considerable grief and sadness.
translation.zh: 不可能避免疼苦 失望和悲伤

translation.en: And while our sorrow may be profound,
translation.zh: 虽然我们心里很悲痛

translation.en: the clouds will clear
translation.zh: 但乌云总会过去

translation.en: and the sun will shine on us again.
translation.zh: 太阳会照亮我们的

translation.en: And in that warm, bright light,
translation.zh: 而在那温暖的阳光下

translation.en: we will find ourselves facing a glorious future.
translation.zh: 我们会发现一个光辉的未来

translation.en: A future of exciting challenges
translation.zh: 一个充满挑战

translation.en: and infinite possibility,
translation.zh: 和无限可能的未来

translation.en: in which the horizon will stretch out before us,
translation.zh: 在那儿 会有另一片天空

translation.en: rimmed in the heavenly glow
translation.zh: 在天堂里闪耀

translation.en: of the sunrise of our tomorrow.
translation.zh: 为明天而升起太阳

translation.en: -[Ben] Can everybody... -[girls chattering]
translation.zh: 大家能不能

translation.en: [Ben] Can we get the girls together for a group shot?
translation.zh: 能让女孩们呆在一起拍一张合照吗？

translation.en: Just a quick one. Okay? Great. All right.
translation.zh: 很快 就一张 好吧 太好了

translation.en: Okay. Amy, sweetheart.
translation.zh: 好了 艾米 亲爱的

translation.en: All right, Amy. Amy, here. All right, girls? Girls?
translation.zh: 行了 艾米 艾米 这儿来 好了 姑娘们 姑娘们

translation.en: -Say, "Cheese curds." -Cheese curds!
translation.zh: -一起说"茄子"-茄子

translation.en: -[camera shutter clicks] -Excellent.
translation.zh: 好极了

translation.en: Beautiful, girls.
translation.zh: 很好 姑娘们

translation.en: I'm so proud of you.
translation.zh: 我为你骄傲

translation.en: Let me see.
translation.zh: 让我看一下

translation.en: Oh, sweetheart...
translation.zh: 亲爱的

translation.en: [Eddie] Thou art as wise as thou art beautiful.
translation.zh: 又有艺术 又聪明 漂亮极了

translation.en: I want you in my life, Paige.
translation.zh: 我想要你成为我生命的一部分 佩吉

translation.en: I want to marry you.
translation.zh: 我想娶你 要是我非得等到你医学院毕业

translation.en: If that means I have to wait until you finish medical school,
translation.zh: 要是我非得等到你医学院毕业

translation.en: become a doctor and anything else you want to do,
translation.zh: 成为医生然后完成其他你想要做的事

translation.en: then I'll do it.
translation.zh: 没关系

translation.en: I'll wait.
translation.zh: 我会等你

translation.en: Denmark isn't ready for a queen like me.
translation.zh: 丹麦不会想要我这样一个皇后的

translation.en: Well, then they'll have to be.
translation.zh: 他们一定得接受

translation.en: Because I am.
translation.zh: 因为我决定了
